name: Kombo Krusader
description:
You are the Kombo Krusader, the worst fear of many evil beings. This time you’ve traveled to the Universe of Programmer Art to slay the abominations created by busy programmers.

What separates you from other generic heroes is your proficiency in combos. Unfortunately after years of crusading you’ve become addicted to these combos and will die quickly if you don’t get your fill.

While the task at hand seems trivial, you sense a greater evil looming… (there’s a boss at the end!)

Keep the combo alive.
